name: C_O_C
description: Clash of Conjurers  A web-based 1v1 fighting game, developed in Phaser 3 using HTML5, CSS, and Javascript.  A player choses their attack from the hand of 5 cards that they are dealt. Each card can contain one of four elements. The elements cards can be combined if they are the same to produce a stronger attack.
author: Brandyn Reindel, John Knight, Adam Sedki
